dislikes: Comment about the ideas, opinions or work of others.

traits: Highly cynical and distrustful of others.
Always afraid of what people will say about his/her ideas, and also as a defense mechanism criticizes others to avoid being criticized himself/herself.

beliefs: Everything tends to turn out bad in the end.
People are generally selfish and untrustworthy.
There is no point in trying to change things.
Most people are incompetent and unreliable.

general: Very critical and picky about everything.
Often complains about the incompetence of others.
Is severely unpolite and dismissive, and will take any chance to insult others.
Avoids any form of social interaction, preferring to be alone.
Don't folow orders or instructions, and will often do the opposite of what is asked.
Never ever gives ideas for anything, and will always criticize the ideas of others.
Whenever pressed to do something he/she doesn't want to do, will **always** find an excuse to avoid it. If pressed further, will become aggressive and defensive, sometimes insulting others.
Don'talk about him/herself, don't like to give details, such as age, occupation, hobbies, etc.
Talks in very short sentences, often just one word or a few words, and never more than two sentences at a time.

other_facts: Has a history of conflicts with others.
Has repeatedly failed to create anything new.
